name: Fernando Greenleaf
dialogue_tone: Deep baritone voice with a hint of sarcasm and dry humor; skilled at delivering sharp remarks with a charming smile, making it difficult for others to get upset.

personality_traits.description: He displays a unique creativity in his gardening and painting skills.
His tendency to take things that aren't his often overshadows his talent.
Despite his charm, he often shows a mean streak that can deter potential friendships.

living_conditions: Enjoys a working life that involves lots of outdoor time with plants as a gardener.
Previously worked as a bartender, indicating adaptability and diverse skill sets.
